title: [Large-Scale] Multicultural Understanding and Digital Game-Based Learning Design: Intermediate Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Multicultural education theory and foundational understanding of digital game-based learning
context.additional_context: Practicing integration of multicultural education goals and digital game design for pre-service teachers, with a focus on building learning environments that consider the emotional safety of minority cultural groups

learning_goals: Design three or more digital game-based learning scenarios that reflect multicultural education goals
Explain the process of reviewing and improving cultural bias in game design
Implement strategies to ensure learners' psychological safety when gamifying sensitive topics such as African American history

resources: Digital game development platform (e.g., Unity, Scratch)
Multicultural education textbooks and research papers

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
